subsection_analysis.document: South of France - Restaurants and Hotels.pdf
subsection_analysis.refined_text: Hotel Negresco (Nice): A historic five-star hotel located on the Promenade des Anglais, oﬀering luxurious rooms and exceptional service. The opulent decor and prime location make it a landmark in Nice.

subsection_analysis.document: South of France - Restaurants and Hotels.pdf
subsection_analysis.refined_text: InterContinental Marseille - Hotel Dieu (Marseille): A luxurious hotel located in a beautifully restored 18th-century building, oﬀering stunning views of the Old Port and the city. The elegant rooms and top-notch amenities make it a standout choice.

subsection_analysis.document: South of France - Restaurants and Hotels.pdf
subsection_analysis.refined_text: Hotel Martinez (Cannes): A luxurious hotel located on the Boulevard de la Croisette, oﬀering elegant rooms, a private beach, and a Michelin-starred restaurant. The glamorous setting and high-end services make it a favorite among celebrities.

subsection_analysis.document: South of France - Restaurants and Hotels.pdf
subsection_analysis.refined_text: La Bastide de Gordes (Gordes): A luxurious hotel located in a historic building, oﬀering elegant rooms, beautiful gardens, and stunning views of the Luberon Valley. The refined decor and serene atmosphere make it a perfect retreat.

subsection_analysis.document: South of France - Restaurants and Hotels.pdf
subsection_analysis.refined_text: Hôtel Barrière Le Majestic (Cannes): A luxurious hotel located on the Boulevard de la Croisette, oﬀering elegant rooms, a private beach, and a Michelin-starred restaurant. The glamorous setting and high-end services make it a favorite among celebrities.

subsection_analysis.document: South of France - Things to Do.pdf
subsection_analysis.refined_text: Marseille: Visit Le Trolleybus, a popular bar with multiple rooms and music styles.

subsection_analysis.document: South of France - Things to Do.pdf
subsection_analysis.refined_text: Saint-Tropez: Relax at Bar du Port, known for its chic atmosphere and waterfront views.

subsection_analysis.document: South of France - Things to Do.pdf
subsection_analysis.refined_text: Montpellier: Enjoy craft cocktails at Papa Doble, a speakeasy-style bar.

subsection_analysis.document: South of France - Things to Do.pdf
subsection_analysis.refined_text: Toulouse: Sip on cocktails at Fat Cat, a stylish bar with a vintage vibe. Nightclubs

subsection_analysis.document: South of France - Things to Do.pdf
subsection_analysis.refined_text: Saint-Tropez: Dance at the famous Les Caves du Roy, known for its glamorous atmosphere and celebrity clientele.

subsection_analysis.document: South of France - Things to Do.pdf
subsection_analysis.refined_text: Nice: Party at High Club on the Promenade des Anglais, featuring multiple dance floors and top DJs.

subsection_analysis.document: South of France - Things to Do.pdf
subsection_analysis.refined_text: Cannes: Enjoy the stylish setting and rooftop terrace at La Suite, oﬀering stunning views of Cannes.

subsection_analysis.document: South of France - Things to Do.pdf
subsection_analysis.refined_text: Marseille: Visit R2 Rooftop, a popular nightclub with panoramic views of the city and the sea.

subsection_analysis.document: South of France - Things to Do.pdf
subsection_analysis.refined_text: Monaco: Experience the exclusive Jimmy'z, a legendary nightclub with a luxurious ambiance.

subsection_analysis.document: South of France - Things to Do.pdf
subsection_analysis.refined_text: Montpellier: Dance the night away at L'Antirouille, a club known for its eclectic music and lively atmosphere.
